long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Chrome Extension will track your time spent browsing your favorite image site (Tested at 99.996% accuracy)! Simply press start and the timer will begin counting your Imgur time.  Hitting stop twice will reset the timer.  The extension will also save your current time if you should happen to accidentally close your Chrome browser (bragging rights anyone?).  However, closing Chrome from the taskbar will end your streak.
